radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar dependent atelectasis, left greater than right, no pleural effusion, subcentimeter hypodensity in the liver, bilateral parapelvic renal cysts, mild left hydronephrosis, segment of sigmoid colon with numerous diverticula, circumferential mural thickening, developing abscess measuring 5.7 x 4.0 cm, dilated small bowel loops, small amount of perihepatic ascites, collapsed bladder with Foley catheter, mildly enlarged prostate, large right inguinal hernia with some fluid.
